data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_961378be3f498d42c25b3defd1635ad1.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
Yi Sun-shin attacks with his <font color="a6aafb">longbow</font> or <font color="a6aafb">glaive</font> according to his distance from the target.

<font color="a6aafb">Weapon Mastery</font>: After each weapon swap, the next two attacks will be enhanced. The first attack deals 70%-100% Crit Damage and the second attack deals 55%-70% Crit Damage. Each enhanced attack grants 15% Movement Speed for 1s and reduces the cooldown of <font color="a6aafb">Traceless</font> by 1s.

After every 180s or when Yi Sun-shin respawns, a <font color="a6aafb">Turtle Ship</font> will spawn at the allied Base. Yi Sun-shin can board the <font color="a6aafb">Turtle Ship</font>, gaining 60% Movement Speed (decays to 21% after 6s) and enhancing <font color="a6aafb">Traceless</font>.

Yi Sun-shin dashes forward and slashes with his glaive, dealing 150<font color="fba51f"> (+40% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and becoming immune to control effects for 1s.

<font color="a6aafb">Tap</font>: Yi Sun-shin slashes swiftly with his glaive, dealing 240<font color="fba51f"> (+80% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>.

<font color="a6aafb">Hold</font>: Yi Sun-shin shoots a powerful arrow, dealing 240<font color="fba51f"> (+80% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the target. The arrow's damage scales with the hold time, up to 200%. This damage decays with the number of enemies hit but can't go below 40%. His Movement Speed is reduced by 20% while holding the skill.

Yi Sun-shin gains <font color="a6aafb">Weapon Mastery</font> immediately when this skill is used.

<font color="a6aafb">Passive</font>: Increases the damage of <font color="a6aafb">Heavenly Vow's</font> first enhanced Basic Attack by 10% and second enhanced Basic Attack by 5%.

<font color="a6aafb">Active</font>: Yi Sun-shin commands the naval fleet to launch 3 waves of cannon shots on the locations of all enemy heroes, revealing their positions and dealing 150<font color="fba51f"> (+50% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in the area with each wave. (When a target is hit multiple times by the same wave, a maximum of 150% damage will be dealt.)

Yi Sun-shin attacks with his <font color="a6aafb">longbow</font> or <font color="a6aafb">glaive</font> according to his distance from the target.

<font color="a6aafb">Weapon Mastery</font>: After each weapon swap, the next two attacks will be enhanced. The first attack deals 70%-100% Crit Damage and the second attack deals 55%-70% Crit Damage. Each enhanced attack grants 15% Movement Speed for 1s and reduces the cooldown of <font color="a6aafb">Traceless</font> by 1s.

After every 180s or when Yi Sun-shin respawns, a <font color="a6aafb">Turtle Ship</font> will spawn at the allied Base. Yi Sun-shin can board the <font color="a6aafb">Turtle Ship</font>, gaining 60% Movement Speed (decays to 21% after 6s) and enhancing <font color="a6aafb">Traceless</font>.

Yi Sun-shin orders the Turtle Ship to charge toward the target, dealing 200<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the first enemy hit and nearby enemies and stunning them for 1.2s.

<font color="a6aafb">Tap</font>: Yi Sun-shin slashes swiftly with his glaive, dealing 240<font color="fba51f"> (+80% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>.

<font color="a6aafb">Hold</font>: Yi Sun-shin shoots a powerful arrow, dealing 240<font color="fba51f"> (+80% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the target. The arrow's damage scales with the hold time, up to 200%. This damage decays with the number of enemies hit but can't go below 40%. His Movement Speed is reduced by 20% while holding the skill.

Yi Sun-shin gains <font color="a6aafb">Weapon Mastery</font> immediately when this skill is used.

<font color="a6aafb">Passive</font>: Increases the damage of <font color="a6aafb">Heavenly Vow's</font> first enhanced Basic Attack by 10% and second enhanced Basic Attack by 5%.

<font color="a6aafb">Active</font>: Yi Sun-shin commands the naval fleet to launch 3 waves of cannon shots on the locations of all enemy heroes, revealing their positions and dealing 150<font color="fba51f"> (+50% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in the area with each wave. (When a target is hit multiple times by the same wave, a maximum of 150% damage will be dealt.)

data.name: Yi Sun-shin

__data.skilldesc:
Deal 520 (+80*Hero Level) <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to the target Creep or Minion.
<font color="62f8fe">Passive</font>: Increases Creep rewards by 60% and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by 40%. Also grants 15% additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first 2 min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first 5 min.
<font color="62f8fe">Blessing:</font> Accumulate 5 Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.
__data.skilldesc_text: Deal <Num1> [C5True Damage] to the target Creep or Minion.####[C2Passive]: Increases Creep rewards by <%Num2> and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by <%Num3>. Also grants <%Num5> additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first <Num4> min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first <Num6> min.####[C2Blessing:] Accumulate <Num8> Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.
__data.skilldescemblem:
Deal 520 (+80*Hero Level) <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to the target Creep or Minion.
<font color="62f8fe">Passive</font>: Increases Creep rewards by 60% and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by 40%. Also grants 15% additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first 2 min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first 5 min.
<font color="62f8fe">Blessing:</font> Accumulate 5 Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.

recommendmasterplan.description: Jungle: Extreme damage with the possibility of bursting down the enemy in the early game.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+14 Adaptive Penetration
+10 Adaptive Attack
+3% Movement Speed

emblemskill.skilldesc: Gain 5% extra Crit Chance and 10% extra Crit Damage.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Gain <%Num1> extra Crit Chance and <%Num2> extra Crit Damage.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Gain 5% extra Crit Chance and 10% extra Crit Damage.

emblemskill.skilldesc: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by 5%.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by <%Num1>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by 5%.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
After killing an enemy hero, instantly recover 15% of Lost HP and gain 20% Movement Speed.

<font color="8098ab">Duration: 3s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: After killing an enemy hero, instantly recover <%Num1> of Lost HP and gain <%Num2> Movement Speed.########[8098ab]Duration: <Num3>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
After killing an enemy hero, instantly recover 15% of Lost HP and gain 20% Movement Speed.

<font color="8098ab">Duration: 3s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Hunter: After dealing damage to a Creep, deal 25(+3*Hero Level) + (+0.01 Total HP) True Damage to the target over 3s (damage is increased by 100% for non-Marksmen heroes).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Hunter: After dealing damage to a Creep, deal 25(+3*Hero Level) + (+0.01 Total HP) True Damage to the target over 3s (damage is increased by 100% for non-Marksmen heroes).

equiplist.equipskill1:
Fighting Spirit: Attacks grant 12 extra Physical Attack per second for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Deals extra 10% True Damage based on the damage dealt (no damage reduction counted) at full stacks.
<font color="A4AAC7">Marksmen, Mages, and Supports only receive 50% of these stacked effects</font>.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Fighting Spirit: Attacks grant 12 extra Physical Attack per second for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Deals extra 10% True Damage based on the damage dealt (no damage reduction counted) at full stacks.
<font color="A4AAC7">Marksmen, Mages, and Supports only receive 50% of these stacked effects</font>.
equiplist.equiptips:
+35 Extra Physical Attack
+400 Extra Max HP
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+12% Spell Vamp

equiplist.equipskill1: Divine Justice: After casting a skill, the next Basic Attack within 3s deals <font color="fba51f"> (+0.6 Total Physical Attack)</font> extra True Damage (1.5s cooldown).
equiplist.equipskill2: Chase Fate: Triggering Divine Justice grants 10% extra Movement Speed.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Divine Justice: After casting a skill, the next Basic Attack within 3s deals <font color="fba51f"> (+0.6 Total Physical Attack)</font> extra True Damage (1.5s cooldown).
Chase Fate: Triggering Divine Justice grants 10% extra Movement Speed.
equiplist.equiptips:
+60 Extra Physical Attack
+250 Extra Max HP
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+8% Hybrid Lifesteal
+5% Movement Speed
+5 Mana Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Despair: Dealing damage to non-Minion enemies below 50% HP increases Physical Attack by 25% for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Despair: Dealing damage to non-Minion enemies below 50% HP increases Physical Attack by 25% for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).

equiplist.equipskill1: Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
equiplist.equipskill2: Breaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 30%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
Breaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 30%.

equiplist.equipskill1: Timestream: Hero kills or assists reduce the Ultimate's current cooldown by 30%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Timestream: Hero kills or assists reduce the Ultimate's current cooldown by 30%.
equiplist.equiptips:
+30 Adaptive Attack
+600 Extra Max HP
+15% Cooldown Reduction

recommendmasterplan.name: OHMYFOE
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: Leader of the City of the Dragon Fleet.

assist.desc: Yi Sun-shin works best with Fighters who can initiate, such as Alpha and Khaleed, so he can follow up and unleash his full damage after they have CC'd the enemy.

strong.desc: Yi Sun-shin counters heroes that lack CC like Uranus and Terizla who are at the mercy of his ability to jump in and out of melee range using his 2 weapons.

weak.desc: Yi Sun-shin is countered by heroes with CC skills, such as Franco and Kaja who can lock him down and stop him from freely swapping weapons.
